@Gray_1x @Tibbsy010 Laptop pretty much always up stairs, so no major issue. Only getting around 6-14 just now on a 72 connection!

@Tibbsy010 @Gray_1x Yeah got a couple. Just a case of assigning it a different SSID?
@Tibbsy010 @Gray_1x Already have a switch but laptop has to be on WiFi. Using another router would effectively give me a switch and WiFi no?
@Gray_1x The broadband up to it but I'm guessing it's probably way way easier to just add another router up stairs and use the ethernet that way 😂

@Gray_1x I think I was over complicating what I wanted to do now if I'm honest 😂. Got ethernet running from router downstairs for Xbox and TV as wireless signal is shit. Laptop isn't fairing well with it so was wondering if I could move the router upstairs and use ethernet to carry...
